I am a third-year undergrad at UC San Diego, double majoring in Data Science at the Halıcıoğlu Data Science Institute and Mathematics-Computer Science at the Department of Mathematics.

My research focuses on natural language processing (NLP), large language models (LLMs), and the broader fields of artificial intelligence (AI) and machine learning (ML). I have the privilege to work at the Laboratory for Emerging Intelligence, where I'm advised by Dr. Leon Bergen and Dr. Ramamohan Paturi.

For more information about my work, please visit my research page.
